game.name: 4x4 drive offroad
game.description:
It is time to take your craze for 4x4 driving to the next level! Join 4X4 Drive Offroad and be prepared to complete several important missions on your favorite vehicle! Avoid being hesitant if some mud gets on the wheels of your truck! Grab your vehicle and get ready to turn your wheel to the countryside in the optimum possible way! Common boys! You have the skill of driving new trucks with detailed interiors even in a single day in this brand new racing game.

The best part is that no one would ask you about your driving license before sitting on their seat. No need to get scared of as you are a champion in driving vehicles on the unruly roads. You would have multiple quests to accomplish in this HTML5 car simulator. Choose anyone out of two-mode options and get ready to race your vehicle through 20 unique and addictive challenges! Each level comes with a unique mission so get yourself ready accordingly.

Sometimes, you are assigned a job of grabbing a particular amount of stars, while you will have to reach a recent plane crash the other times. In the first level mode, you will also be asked to spot a ship or pass through different checkpoints to complete the levels. These missions will come with a time-limit so try to be a little bit quick. Complete levels on time to earn some cash through which you can unlock 7 other advanced vehicles in this free cool car racing game! Check out 6x6 Offroad Truck Driving Simulator 2020 if you seek extra racing fun and thrill!
